CenterLine.description: The center line of the joist at the clear height elevation

TopOfSteelSlopeLine.description: The top of steel line of the joist, sloped

TopOfSteelDoubleSlopeLine.description: The top of steel line of the joist, double sloped

polygons.description: List of all polygons that represent this wind pressure on the given joist

EndReactions_k.description: The end reactions of the element in kips for each load type (service level)

JoistLinearLoads_plf.description: These are the unfactored linear loads applied to the joist (plf)

JoistDesignLoads.description: the design loads used for gravity and uplift, put through load combos

ReferenceDesignGroupGuid.description: This is the GUID of the joist design group

TribArea_poly.description: Tributary area polygon of the joist

JoistLiveLoadReductionFactor.description: The reduction factor for live loads based on slope and trib area of the joist

JoistWindUplift_psf.description: The wind psf on the joist based on the joist tributary area

IsDoubleSloped.description: Joist is sloped in two directions if set to true.  Usually when there is a ridgeline at midspan of the joist.

TopChordWidth_in.description: The width of the top chord in inches

StartDepth_in.description: Seat Depth in inches at the start point of this joist

EndDepth_in.description: Seat Depth in inches at the end point of this joist

BridgingRequirements.description: Provides the specifications for joist bridging.

topChordRows.description: Required number of top chord rows.

bottomChordRows.description: Required number of bottom chord rows.

exRows.description: Required number of diagonal erection rows.

Category.description: A helper property to help categorize which group the joists should be in.  For example, mezzanine, roof, etc...

CellComplexParentId.description: The GUID of the parent Cell complex from which this joist was created
